resumeText:
SOFIA RAMIREZ
San Francisco, CA • sofia@example.com • github.com/sofiaramirez

SUMMARY
Senior product engineer leading end-to-end delivery of accessible React and Node.js web experiences for 15M+ monthly users. Expert in experimentation strategy, resilient API design, and data instrumentation, with a track record of mentoring teams toward a growth mindset.

EXPERIENCE
Senior Product Engineer — Loop Labs (2021–Present)
- Led cross-functional pods delivering end-to-end experimentation journeys in React and Node.js, shipping 30+ tests annually and lifting activation 15%.
- Modernized experimentation platform with TypeScript and GraphQL APIs plus observability guardrails, cutting launch time 40% while sustaining <0.2% error rates.
- Drove WCAG AA design system adoption across 12 surfaces, unlocking inclusive customer flows and faster delivery cycles.
- Built mentoring and growth mindset programs for 6 engineers, increasing deployment confidence scores 25% and seeding org-wide instrumentation standards.

Product Engineer — Brightline (2018–2021)
- Owned discovery-to-launch of experimentation dashboards that enabled PM self-service and improved activation by 9%.
- Designed Node.js services and data tracking plans to capture experiment telemetry, improving decision accuracy 20%.
- Facilitated cross-functional growth mindset workshops that aligned engineering and product on rapid learning loops.

PROJECTS
Impact Review Automation — Automated GPT-powered insight pack generation for experiment reviews, saving 30 hours/quarter and standardizing instrumentation handoffs.

EDUCATION
B.S. Computer Science, University of Texas at Austin

SKILLS
React, Node.js, GraphQL, Accessibility, Experimentation, Mentoring, Data instrumentation, TypeScript
jobDescription: We need a senior product engineer to lead end-to-end delivery of web experiences. Key focuses: React, Node.js, experimentation, API design, accessibility, data instrumentation, mentoring, growth mindset.
